timeline.message:
Optional expiration for sponsored members

- When a sponsored member lost his sponsorship, he automatically expired
  in the VO.
- Now it is possible to add a rule to the vo's membershipExpirationRules
  attribute, which switches off the automatic expiration.
- The rule is called doNotExpireSponsoredMembers and it can be set to
  either true or false (false when not set).

timeline.bodyText: Are you sure this is the right place for these variables? Can't you use a module for attribute instead? By this, you are creating a duplicate of the key in the code.
timeline.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: I have used static variables from module urn_perun_vo_attribute_def_def_membershipExpirationRules.
replies.author: balcirakpeter

timeline.bodyText: I don't think "dateMatcher" is the right name for this variable.
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: Please add also test which checks this behavior without attribute set (or with the false in value set) if not exists yet.
timeline.author: stavamichal

replies.bodyText: There is already a test, which checks the situation when the attribute is not set.
replies.author: balcirakpeter

timeline.bodyText: Even there you probably can use the static variable from the module.
timeline.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: I would change this variable to "shouldBeExpired = true". It will be easier for reading.
timeline.author: stavamichal
Vojtech-Sassmann

replies.bodyText: It is also a possibility and I have no problem with it.
replies.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyText: I would think about this exception. Maybe if there is a problem, we should log it as error and continue as default = expire members.
timeline.author: stavamichal
